casebody.data:
SKINNER et al.
v.
PREFERRED CREDIT et al. No. 525A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 14, 2005. William G. Wright, Wilmington, A. Holt Rowell, III, Mount Pleasant, SC, Daniel Myers, Eric G. Calhoun, Dallas, TX, for Skinners et al. Hada V. Haulsee, Ronald R. Davis, Bradley R. Johnson, Winston-Salem, for Preferred Credit Trust. Robert R. Marcus, Angela L. Little, Greensboro, Daniel J. Tobin, for Impac Funding.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of December 2005 by Plaintiffs for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiffs (Skinners) shall have up to and including the 17th day of January 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of December 2005."
